text: Kottigehara is a village located atop the Charmadi ghat in Chikkamagaluru district of Karnataka state, India. The nearest railway stations are at Chikkamagaluru (47 km) and Mangaluru (104 km) respectively.Post office and Kaveri gramin bank available. The Panchayat chairperson is Ravikala Pai wife of Late Shree Vaikunt Pai. Category:Villages in Chikkamagaluru district}
title: Kottigehara
